name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior ML Engineer with over 8 years of experience in software engineering, I excel in **Machine Learning** and **Software Systems Architecture**, delivering innovative engineering solutions across various sectors. My technical proficiency includes advanced skills in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy) and I am adept at leading technical discussions and providing **Technical Leadership**. I specialize in collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive **Technical Consultation** and ensuring robust design through **Design Reviews**. My background also includes developing scalable cloud applications using **AWS** and **Azure**, and employing **microservices architecture** and **REST/gRPC API development** for enterprise-grade software solutions. Known for my strong **Interpersonal Skills** and **Problem Analysis** capabilities, I contribute to staff development and foster a culture of **Lean** principles within teams.
